summary_strategy: Reframe as a platform engineer who builds secure, scalable data infrastructure — emphasize production-grade tooling, operational reliability, and cross-functional delivery over defensive security framing
skills_strategy: Use condensed 3-line format prioritizing Cloud/Platform, Security Data/AI, and API automation; drop generic categories like 'Web & Internal Tooling' in favor of explicit alignment with Supabase's data-first, open-source platform focus

experience_focus.must_highlight: production-grade tooling delivery, data pipeline construction, operational reliability practices
experience_focus.safe_metrics_to_keep: 10,000+ devices managed, 200 hours saved annually, 500 hours reduced workload, 30% fewer user-reported issues
experience_focus.claims_to_avoid: any mention of 'security analysis', 'risk reduction engineering', or unverified claims about impact scale beyond documented metrics

risk_controls: Never invent specific tools, metrics, or outcomes not explicitly present in source resume
Replace speculative claims (e.g., 'improved SLAs') with factual operational outcomes only
Avoid passive corporate phrasing like 'spearheaded', 'drove' — use active verbs: built, designed, deployed, automated
